# sPCA
```{r}
combined <- readRDS(file = paste0(home_dir, "/AD_mouse_objects_ortholog/mouse_spca_loadings.RData"))
```

```{r}
drug <- read_tsv(paste0(home_dir, "/AD_human_objects_ortholog/cp_mean_coeff_SB334867.tsv"))
#drug <- read.csv(paste0(home_dir, "/AD_human_objects_ortholog/cp_SB33_filtered.csv"), row.names = 1)
```

```{r}
drug <- drug[,-1]
drug <- data.frame(t(drug))
colnames(drug) <- c("SB33486_score")
drug
```

```{r}
spca_loadings <- data.frame(combined@reductions$spca@feature.loadings)
write.csv(spca_loadings, file = paste0(home_dir, "/spca_loadings.csv"))
```


```{r}
nrow(drug)
nrow(spca_loadings)
```

```{r}
mouse_genes <- row.names(spca_loadings)
human_genes <- row.names(drug)
```

```{r}
adjusted_mouse <- convert_orthologs(gene_df = mouse_genes,
                                    input_species = "mouse",
                                    output_species = "human",
                                    non121_strategy = "drop_both_species")
```

```{r}
adjusted_human <- convert_orthologs(gene_df = human_genes,
                                    input_species = "human",
                                    output_species = "mouse",
                                    non121_strategy = "drop_both_species")
```

```{r}
length(row.names(adjusted_mouse))
adjusted_mouse <- adjusted_mouse %>%
  filter(row.names(adjusted_mouse) %in% adjusted_human$input_gene)
length(row.names(adjusted_mouse))
```

```{r}
length(row.names(adjusted_human))
adjusted_human <- adjusted_human %>%
  filter(row.names(adjusted_human) %in% adjusted_mouse$input_gene)
length(row.names(adjusted_human))
```

```{r}
length(row.names(adjusted_mouse))
adjusted_mouse <- adjusted_mouse %>%
  filter(row.names(adjusted_mouse) %in% adjusted_human$input_gene)
length(row.names(adjusted_mouse))
```

```{r}
drug <- drug %>%
  filter(row.names(drug) %in% adjusted_human$input_gene)
row.names(drug) <- row.names(adjusted_human)
drug
```

```{r}
spca_loadings <- spca_loadings %>%
  filter(row.names(spca_loadings) %in% adjusted_mouse$input_gene)
spca_loadings
```

```{r}
drug <- drug %>%
  arrange(row.names(drug))
spca_loadings <- spca_loadings %>%
  arrange(row.names(spca_loadings))
```

```{r}
head(drug)
head(spca_loadings)
```

```{r}
write.csv(drug, file = paste0(home_dir, "/drug_orthologs/SB33_orthologs_spca.csv"), row.names = TRUE)
```


```{r}
significant_pcs <- c(2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9, 10, 
                     11, 12, 14, 15, 17, 20,
                     22, 23, 24, 25, 29, 30,
                     32, 36,
                     42, 45, 46, 47, 50)
spca_loadings <- spca_loadings[,significant_pcs]
```


```{r}
drug_mouse_cor_spca <- cor(spca_loadings, drug, method = c("spearman"))
```

```{r}
ggcorrplot(drug_mouse_cor_spca)
```
